channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: VFX会社DNEGがアブダビのUASGから20億ドルの評価額で2億ドルを調達、AIを搭載したフォトリアルCGIクリエイターを開発する部門Brahmaを拡大する（Melanie Goodfellow/Deadline）
item.description:
Melanie Goodfellow / Deadline:
VFX company DNEG raised $200M from Abu Dhabi's UASG at a $2B valuation, to expand its division Brahma, which is developing an AI-powered, photo-real CGI creator  —  London-based The DNEG Group has secured a $200M capital injection from Abu Dhabi investment firm United Al Saqer Group (UASG).

item.title: アンペア分析：2024年第1四半期、ネットフリックスとアマゾンは全世界の全オリジナルストリーミングタイトルの53％を委託、米国外への投資増が拍車（Lucas Manfredi/The Wrap）
item.description:
Lucas Manfredi / The Wrap:
Ampere Analysis: in Q1 2024, Netflix and Amazon commissioned 53% of all original streaming titles globally, spurred by increased investment outside of the US  —  The growth comes from increased investment in international territories, according to Ampere Analysis

item.title: 情報筋ロン・ハワードとブライアン・グレイザーが率いるイマジン・エンターテインメントは、買収希望者から関心を寄せられ、買い手を探している。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Imagine Entertainment, led by Ron Howard and Brian Grazer, is seeking a buyer after receiving some inbound interest from a potential suitor  —  Production company behind ‘Apollo 13’ is working with bankers to explore a sale  —  Imagine Entertainment, the Hollywood production company known …

item.title: ディズニー、ライオンズゲート、NBCU、ソニー・ピクチャーズなどのディストリビューターが提供する20,000本以上の映画やTVエピソードを取り揃えたTubiが英国でスタート（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
Tubi launches in the UK with more than 20,000 movies and TV episodes, featuring content from distributors including Disney, Lionsgate, NBCU, and Sony Pictures  —  The ad-supported streamer now has more than 80 million monthly active users.  —  Tubi, the free advertising-supported streaming service owned …

item.title: 情報筋バリー・ディラー、パラマウントの経営権取得を模索中、デジタルメディア複合企業IACはNational AmusementsとNDA締結（New York Times）
item.description:
New York Times:
Sources: Barry Diller is exploring a bid to take control of Paramount; his digital media conglomerate, IAC, has signed NDAs with National Amusements  —  Mr. Diller, a digital media pioneer, lost a bidding war for Paramount Pictures decades ago.  Now, he's making a run at its parent company.

item.title: グーグル、実在の人物や現実的な出来事を描いたデジタル加工コンテンツを使用した選挙広告の開示を広告主に求めると発表（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
Google says it will require advertisers to disclose election ads that use digitally altered content that depicts real or realistic-looking people or events  —  Google (GOOGL.O) said on Monday it would make it mandatory for advertisers to disclose election ads that use digitally altered content …

item.title: YouTubeは、AIが生成した、あるいは自分の顔や声をシミュレートしたその他の合成コンテンツの削除を要請できるようにするポリシー変更を実施した（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
YouTube rolled out a policy change that will let people request the takedown of AI-generated or other synthetic content that simulates their face or voice  —  Meta is not the only company grappling with the rise in AI-generated content and how it affects its platform.

item.title: 情報源パラマウント・グローバルはParamount+と各ストリーマーとの合併について他社と協議中、WBDはMaxとParamount+の合併に関心（Alex Sherman/CNBC）
item.description:
Alex Sherman / CNBC:
Sources: Paramount Global is in discussions with other companies about merging Paramount+ with their streamers; WBD is interested in merging Max and Paramount+  —  Paramount Global is holding talks with other entertainment companies about merging its Paramount+ streaming service with an existing platform.

item.title: USAトゥデイのテレンス・サミュエル編集長が1年で退任、政治担当のエグゼクティブ・エディター、カレン・ボーハンが暫定EICに就任（ケイティ・ロバートソン／ニューヨーク・タイムズ）。
item.description:
Katie Robertson / New York Times:
Terence Samuel, the editor-in-chief of USA Today, leaves the role after a year; Caren Bohan, the executive editor of politics, is named interim EIC  —  Terence Samuel, a veteran journalist, had been in the role for a year.  —  Terence Samuel, the editor in chief of USA Today …

item.title: Metaは "Made with AI "のラベルを "AI info "に変更し、画像が必ずしもAIで作成されたわけではないが、AI編集ツールが使用された可能性があることを示す（Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
Meta changes its “Made with AI” label to “AI info”, to indicate images were not necessarily created with AI but that AI editing tools may have been used  —  After Meta started tagging photos with a “Made with AI” label in May, photographers complained …

item.title: 予備調査結果：EUはメタ社の有料または同意広告モデルがDMAに違反すると発表、有罪が確定すればメタ社は最大で全世界の年間売上高の10％の罰金に直面する（Foo Yun Chee/Reuters）
item.description:
Foo Yun Chee / Reuters:
Preliminary findings: the EU says Meta's pay or consent ad model breaches the DMA; Meta faces a fine of up to 10% of its global annual turnover if found guilty  —  Meta Platforms (META.O) was charged by EU antitrust regulators on Monday for failing to comply with landmark tech rules …

item.title: オーストラリア『Nine』のスタッフは、金曜日にマイク・スニースビーCEOに対する不信任案を可決し、彼が200人以上の人員削減を発表した後、労働行動を起こす準備を進めている（Amanda Meade/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Amanda Meade / The Guardian:
Staff at Australia's Nine passed a motion of no-confidence in CEO Mike Sneesby on Friday and prepare to take industrial action, after he announced ~200 job cuts  —  Chief executive Mike Sneesby says ‘economic headwinds’ and end of Meta deal are to blame for lost jobs

item.title: ハンター・バイデン氏、6部構成の "模擬裁判 "シリーズ「The Trial of Hunter Biden」をめぐり、同局が「嫌がらせ」と「屈辱」を与えるために彼を標的にしたと主張し、フォックス・ニュースを提訴（Alex Griffing/Mediaite）
item.description:
Alex Griffing / Mediaite:
Hunter Biden sues Fox News over its six-part “mock trial” series The Trial of Hunter Biden, alleging the network targeted him to “harass” and “humiliate” him  —  Hunter Biden filed a lawsuit in New York City against Fox News on Sunday evening …

item.title: セサミストリート」を制作する非営利団体セサミワークショップは、2025年秋から「セサミストリート」を「再構築」する計画で、新CEOにシェリー・ウェスティンを指名した（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Sesame Workshop, the non-profit that produces Sesame Street, names Sherrie Westin as its new CEO, as it plans to “reimagine” Sesame Street starting in fall 2025  —  The non-profit that produces ‘Sesame Street’ will have its first female CEO since the show's creator, Joan Ganz Cooney.

item.title: 米連邦準備制度理事会（SCOTUS）、テキサス州とフロリダ州のソーシャルメディア法について下級裁判所に再検討を命じる。
item.description:
CBS News:
SCOTUS orders lower courts to take another look at Texas' and Florida's social media laws, saying neither lower court conducted proper analysis of 1A challenges  —  Washington — The Supreme Court on Monday ordered lower courts to take another look at a pair of laws from Florida and Texas …
